summary.para: Values that identify the type of resource to be viewed as a shader resource.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The type is unknown.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_BUFFER
member.summary: The resource is a buffer.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1D
member.summary: The resource is a 1D texture.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1DARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of 1D textures.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D
member.summary: The resource is a 2D texture.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of 2D textures.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMS
member.summary: The resource is a multisampling 2D texture.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DMSARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of multisampling 2D textures.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE3D
member.summary: The resource is a 3D texture.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURECUBE
member.summary: The resource is a cube texture.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURECUBEARRAY
member.summary: The resource is an array of cube textures.

member.name: D3D_SRV_DIMENSION.D3D_SRV_DIMENSION_BUFFEREX
member.summary: The resource is a raw buffer. For more info about raw viewing of buffers, see Raw Views of Buffers.
